issue.title: Please block two more gadget types (DUP)

labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: Duplicate of an existing (usually earlier) issue

repository.name: jackson-databind
repository.description: General data-binding package for Jackson (2.x): works on streaming API (core) implementation(s)

issue.body:
In jackson-databind 2.9.10, you have ban two gadget type ("net.sf.ehcache.transaction.manager.DefaultTransactionManagerLookup" and "net.sf.ehcache.hibernate.EhcacheJtaTransactionManagerLookup"). 
We found another two gadget types to bypass it. (follow up for #2387,#2460)
We have just sent you a mail.

rename.from: Block two more gadget types (JNDI - CVEs to be allocated)
rename.to: Block two more gadget types (ehcache/JNDI - CVEs to be allocated)

issue.title: RMB-504: Jackson-* version 2.10.0, fixes jackson-databind security.

repository.name: raml-module-builder
repository.description: Framework allowing easy module creation based on RAML files

issue.body:
Three serialization gadget (= polymorphic typing) security vulnerability issues have been reported against jackson-databind versions before 2.9.10.1:

jackson-databind 2.9.10.1 (released 2019-10-20) fixes
* commons-dbcp, p6spy (https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-16942 / https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-16943 = https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/2478
* log4j-extras/1.2 (https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-17531 = https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/2498)

jackson-databind 2.9.10.2 (https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson/wiki/Jackson-Release-2.9#micro-patches) (not yet released) fixes
* ehcache/JNDI (CVEs to be allocated = https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/2526)

See also
* https://medium.com/@cowtowncoder/on-jackson-cves-dont-panic-here-is-what-you-need-to-know-54cd0d6e8062
* Jackson 2.10 features (esp "Safe Default Typing" to vanquish stream of CVE patches!) https://medium.com/@cowtowncoder/jackson-2-10-features-cd880674d8a2

issue.title: Security vulnerabilities

repository.name: jackson-databind
repository.description: General data-binding package for Jackson (2.x): works on streaming API (core) implementation(s)

issue.body:
Security vulnerabilities are reported since 2.0 version up to curent 2.10.0 version.
https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-16942
https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-16943
https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-17531 
Do you have any plans to address these?

rename.from: Block two more gadget types (ehcache/JNDI - CVEs to be allocated)
rename.to: Block two more gadget types (ehcache/JNDI - CVE-2019-20330)

body:
I _think_ Mitre allocated id is: CVE-2019-20330

(but haven't seen confirmation, possibly due to email issues wrt fasterxml.org)

> I _think_ Mitre allocated id is: CVE-2019-20330
> 
> (but haven't seen confirmation, possibly due to email issues wrt fasterxml.org)



> 2.9.10.2 was released, along with `jackson-bom` of `2.9.10.20200103`.

Jackson-databind is not getting downloaded from maven after changing the version to 2.9.10.2 in my project's pom.xml.

issue.title: CVE-2019-20330 (High) detected in jackson-databind-2.9.9.jar

repository.name: datahelix
repository.description: The DataHelix generator allows you to quickly create data, based on a JSON profile that defines fields and the relationships between them, for the purpose of testing and validation

issue.body:
## CVE-2019-20330 - High Severity Vulnerability
Vulnerable Library - jackson-databind-2.9.9.jar

General data-binding functionality for Jackson: works on core streaming API

Library home page: http://github.com/FasterXML/jackson

Path to vulnerable library: 20200527172826_OEGVXY/downloadResource_TJNATA/20200527172907/jackson-databind-2.9.9.jar,20200527172826_OEGVXY/downloadResource_TJNATA/20200527172907/jackson-databind-2.9.9.jar

Dependency Hierarchy: - :x: **jackson-databind-2.9.9.jar** (Vulnerable Library)

Found in HEAD commit: 58e7677b9a25cfe6889795439b053bbe23e9a2b6

Vulnerability Details

FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.10.2 lacks certain net.sf.ehcache blocking.

Publish Date: 2020-01-03

URL: CVE-2019-20330

CVSS 3 Score Details (9.8)

Base Score Metrics: - Exploitability Metrics: - Attack Vector: Network - Attack Complexity: Low - Privileges Required: None - User Interaction: None - Scope: Unchanged - Impact Metrics: - Confidentiality Impact: High - Integrity Impact: High - Availability Impact: High

For more information on CVSS3 Scores, click here.

Suggested Fix

Type: Upgrade version

Origin: https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/2526

Release Date: 2020-01-03

Fix Resolution: com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-databind:2.7.9.7,2.8.11.5,2.9.10.2
